Is it possible to use the `curl` command to query the Verus blockchain without providing a username?
No, it is not possible to use the `curl` command to query the Verus blockchain without providing a username. You need to provide a username to authenticate the request.

Examples:
> verus getpeerinfo 
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getpeerinfo", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
